name: Retrieve the Relationship Management Details for Customer with Direct Personal RM

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930000757000"

When I Retrieve the Relationship Management Details for CIF Key: <cifKey>
| cifKey | notes |
| 0100000930000757000 | Customer with Direct Personal RM |

Then the following data Relationship Management Information should be returned
| relationshipManager | rmStaffID | treatmentFlag | rmEmail | rmPhone | lifetimeValue | marketSegment | treatmentStrategy | mgmtLocation |
| Caroline Coyle | 72755 | D | direct.rm@aib.ie | (0818) 304000 |  |  | Personal Premier | DIRECT_RM |

children.description: Validate response: | relationshipManager | rmStaffID | treatmentFlag | rmEmail | rmPhone | lifetimeValue | marketSegment | treatmentStrategy | mgmtLocation | | Caroline Coyle | 72755 | D | direct.rm@aib.ie | (0818) 304000 | | | Personal Premier | DIRECT_RM |
